entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 19 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
